name: Kodai No Kemono (Ancient Beast)
description:
One of the last great Kaiju is finally awakening. Asleep since the dawn of the earth, this great beast has abilities beyond which we can comprehend, but most importantly, has a hunger we can never satiate.

This is a visual novel/text-based game with only one ending, but a variety of different paths and hidden scenes to get there.

Credits:
Art, Programming, and Story by Underpaid_Goblin
Music from ZapSplat.com made by Audio Hero
